item.title: Phototaxis
item.description: We wonder what the moth wonders when she flutters to the lone, warm bulb that stutters in the nondescript nook of our house, possibly looking for faith the way we do. If she does find it fumbling in trepid waters that are first bitter and soon engulfing like most unfamiliar emotions, we may think she is where we are, at the brink of realizing that we are not
